file_content.text: All alert, the enemy is sighted!
Sith, you are massively outnumbered. You will not invade General Faraire's headquarters. Turn away at once.
Jaesa, use your power and scan Faraire's forces for the weak link.
My pleasure, master...
Right away, my lord....
Most of these dogs are brimming with strength and conviction. I sense hate and a willingness to die for the Republic...
Ahh, not so fast. There! An entire column of soldiers who are forced to be here. They will definitely run if singled out.
I sense much strength and conviction in most of these men....
Wait! There! An entire column of soldiers who are forced to be here. Concentrate the attack on them and they will run.
Lead the assault against the conscripts, Jaesa. Make them flee!
Do the honors.
Thank you, master! Men, attack with me!
Men, follow me! Attack!
Keep the other forces at bay while I terrorize the conscripts.
I will handle them.
I've decided to stray from the plan. We can destroy the entire army!
Nah. We'll kill them all.
All attack!
Uh, sure are a lot of them. Quinn said if we can figure out which are the conscripts, we could make them flee.
Any bright ideas on finding the weak link?
I'm appointing you to the task.
You do it.
Me? I'm supposed to somehow find out which are the conscripted men? All right, here goes nothing.
All conscripts of the Republic get to... uh... be spared. So... show of hands?
What form of silliness is this? Some kind of trick, Sith? Well, it's laughable.
Sorry. I tried.
That was a weak effort.
You failed.
I'm sure you could have done better. And should have, in fact.
I'm ready to take on the entire army anyway.
Doesn't matter.
Be careful what you wish for, you might just get me killed.
It was a valiant attempt, Vette.
Good try.
You're too kind. I almost felt bad!
Men, our enemy today has more sense of humor than sense. Let's send them back where they came from!
Captain says there are conscripted soldiers who will run if we push.
Any plan for figuring out where the weak link is?
Flee now or prepare for the end, worms! You will know no mercy in battle.
I'll intimidate them.
No one moves! Maintain your ranks or suffer a court-martial!
Take the court-martial and live! This is your last warning!
Better than death.
Captain Grummalt, your conscripts are getting antsy. Straighten your ranks!
Men, stand firm! We have our payment and our pride--and we will bring the Republic to victory!
Now we know where their conscripts are stationed. Pierce, concentrate our efforts there!
Attack those men! [Attack]
Vette, take the fiercest of our soldiers and attack that column. Make them run!
Attack those men! [Attack]
Alrighty. You heard the order. Let's go, soldiers!
What good is wealth if you're dead, Grummalt?
Credits are useless.
My men may not be patriots, but they are gamblers. Give the command, Major, we're ready to fight!
The command is given! All attack!
I will personally see to it that no one under Grummalt's command survives.
Conscripts die, first.
Grummalt, your men are turning tail! Discipline them immediately!
Sorry, sir, the men have spoken--and I'm with them!
If your commander is dead, who will court-martial you?
He's the first I kill.
We far outnumber the Sith's forces. We will win this day, and all cowards will be punished.
We're with you, sir!
You see, Sith, there's no dissension here. Now, surrender your forces or prepare for the last fight of your life.
If the threat of court-martial keeps your conscripts in line, they are pathetic and deserve their fate.
Never mind. Everyone dies.
So, we take them all on, then. Just means more Republic blood on our hands by the end.
You're my kind of soldier, Pierce.
I like your attitude. [Attack]
That fizzled, huh? So, more to fight than we bargained for. Fun.
The more I get to destroy, the better.
Killing is fun.
Too bad. My invasion will be that much more difficult.
And more standing in my way.
It's unfortunate. More men will have to die than necessary.
We tried to spare lives.
You said you could pull this off, Lieutenant. Let's see what you've got.
You asked for this assignment.
Right, I'm on it. Republic scum, listen to me! I am Lieutenant Pierce of Imperial black ops!
That's right, I'm the one who crushed General Durant's battalion.
Your superior numbers mean nothing! Anyone who doesn't want to die today better run!
Grummalt, straighten your ranks! Your conscripts are getting fidgety!
There, my lord, the conscripts are identified.
Very impressive, Lieutenant. Now, everyone, focus your efforts there. Attack!
Excellent. [Attack]
Don't be so proud of yourself.
Not impressed.
I'll be proud when you're inside that command center.
I'm sure you'll lord it over the captain when we return.
You proved Quinn wrong.
Can't wait to rub it in.
Enough of this posturing. All ranks, the order is given. Attack!
Conscripted scum! We still have numbers! All attack!
I've decided that's unnecessary. We can take out the entire army!
Forget the plan. [Attack]
Everyone, attack!
To arms, all units!
My lord, Quinn here. Somewhere among the enemy are conscripted soldiers who will flee if the attack is concentrated on them.
How will you identify this weak link?
Let's be up-front. Republic Commander, where are your conscripted forces?
I'll just ask.
I beg your pardon, Sith. If this is a stalling tactic, it won't work.
All units, prepare to attack!
Major Khourlet, what does this Sith know about my men?
Back in your ranks, Captain!
Men, focus your efforts on the conscripts! Attack!
You exposed yourself. [Attack]
Grummalt, you fool! Hold your line, the Sith attacks!
I offer you life. Leave the battlefield now or I will make sure every one of you dies.
Flee now and live.
That's it, the lines are drawn. All units attack.
Nicely done, Lieutenant. Broonmark, men, focus your efforts there! Attack!
Excellent. [Attack]
So many of the enemy clan. How do we find the weaker soldiers and make them flee?
I'd like to see how you handle it.
You do it.
We do not seek a reduction in the enemy numbers. We just attack!
The Sith's savage attacks!
I'll intimidate them.
Good! We fight them all now! That means we destroy their entire clan!
